Genome ID sequence; for obtaining new genome IDs.

InnovationIdSeq
public Int32Sequence InnovationIdSeq { get }

Innovation ID sequence; for obtaining new innovation IDs.

AddedNodeBuffer
public AddedNodeBuffer AddedNodeBuffer { get }

A history buffer of added nodes.  Used when adding new nodes to check if an identical node has been added to a genome elsewhere in the population.  This allows re-use of the same innovation ID for like nodes.

NeatPopulationStats
public NeatPopulationStatistics NeatPopulationStats { get }

NeatPopulation statistics.
